existing_features.title: Rename all user-facing UI text that currently says "Track Package" to instead say "Track Order", including navigation, hero CTA button, footer quick link, and the Track section headings/titles/descriptions.

Reorder the homepage sections so that the Pricing section is immediately followed by the "Get Your Free Quote" / "Request a Quote" form section, and the Track Order section appears beneath the Free Quote section.

new_feature_requests.summary: Rename the "Track Package" tab/label to "Track Order"
Move the Track Order section/tab beneath the "Get your free quote" section so the Request a Quote form sits directly beneath the prices

projectName: Rename Track Package to Track Order and move tracking section below Free Quote
